notes.note:
Performance Enhancements:

 - Quantum CSS improvements which improve page rendering times
 - Faster scrolling due to treating touch event listeners as passive by default

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 61.0beta Beta
